name: promise-batching-queue
description: Promise batching library. Runs promises in ordered queues which can be limited to a maximum size.
author: Peter Yamanaka <developer@popinnow.com>

scripts.test: mkdir -p dist/test && webpack --progress --colors ./test/*.test.js -o ./dist/test/tests.js --target node && mocha --require babel-core/register --colors ./dist/test/tests.js
scripts.prepare-publish: yarn clean && yarn && yarn test && yarn clean-dist && yarn build
